channel.title: Dadops on the opposite of cool
channel.description: Recent content in Dadops on the opposite of cool

item.title: My Kid Wrote a Book
item.description: Have a kid, they said. It’ll be fun, they said. I really really love being a familyman, and practicing the #dadops. I may one day give you the rundown on what being a Dad means to me, and the positive changes that process has brought ( or sometimes shoved ) into my life, but today is not that day. Today, I’m gonna celebrate a creation of my 6 and a half-ish old daughter.
